original_text: He answered them, ‘I have told you already and you would not listen. Why do you want to hear it again? Maybe you want to become his disciples too!’
korean_text: 대답하되 내가 이미 일렀어도 듣지 아니하고 어찌하여 다시 듣고자 하나이까 당신들도 그의 제자가 되려 하나이까

sentences.original_text: Why do you want to hear it again?
sentences.korean_translation: 왜 너희는 그것을 다시 듣고 싶어 하는가?

sentences.original_text: Maybe you want to become his disciples too
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 너희도 그의 제자가 되고 싶은 것이겠다
